revised_title: Investigations into Organo-Metallic Radicals: Mercuric, Stannic, and Plumbic Ethyl
tldr: The author investigates the properties and reactions of organo-metallic radicals, specifically mercuric, stannic, and plumbic ethyl. They explore the formation, reactions, and properties of these compounds, including their interactions with acids, salts, and other elements. The author also discusses the boiling points and solubility of these compounds, as well as their potential applications in further research.
